channel.title: Plz help with router for making a server
channel.description:
im new with this making a server stuff
do all computers have 1? but what is a router? or is it the little thing i got to buy to hook up more than 1 computer?
thanks

item.title: Plz help with router for making a server
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yes. You can make a server. What a ridiculous question. You need to have common sense. That’s all. You only need a router to port forward, which you don’t need to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help with router for making a server

item.source: Plz help with router for making a server

item.title: Plz help with router for making a server
item.dc:creator: @Blakmagik Blakmagik
item.description:
@Blakmagik wrote:

Yes, but there also wireless routers with antenas so you can get internet through a computer wirelessly so you don’t need any ethernet cables. But ethernet cables make getting internet faster, and wireless routers’s connection tends to move around, unless of course your computer is in the middle of a huge signal. I have a wireless 204 router, which has wireless connections with the same speed as an ethernet cable!! ^^

Read full topic
